GK19akadambu:0: Abhinanda: Kādambarīkathāsāra śriyaṃ diśantu vaḥ śaurer dvaye tulyaśramāḥ kramāḥ /

GK19akadambu:6: guṇaḥ kṛśo 'pi prathate pṛthur apy apacīyate /

GK19akadambu:17: ajāyata sutaḥ kāntaś candro dugdhodadher iva // AKad_1.9 //
GK19akadambu:20: vṛttikāra iti vyaktaṃ dvitīyaṃ nāma bibhrataḥ /
GK19akadambu:23: sūnuḥ samudabhūt tasmād abhinanda iti śrutaḥ // AKad_1.12 //
GK19akadambu:27: babhūva vidiśā nāma purī vetravatītaṭe // AKad_1.14 //

GK19akadambu:33: aṣṭānāṃ lokapālānāṃ rūpaṃ bibhrad api prajāḥ /

GK19akadambu:39: vinodair atyanīyanta nave vayasi vāsarāḥ // AKad_1.19 //
GK19akadambu:41: yūno 'pi suratakrīḍāparāṅ mukham abhūn manaḥ // AKad_1.20 //
GK19akadambu:43: hartuṃ śaśāka yā tasya hṛdayaṃ cakṣur eva vā // AKad_1.21 //
GK19akadambu:48: śrutvā kṣaṇaṃ parāmṛśya mukham ālokya mantriṇām /
GK19akadambu:49: samādideśa tāṃ rājā ko doṣaḥ praviśatv iti // AKad_1.24 //
GK19akadambu:54: praviśantīṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kanyām adbhutadarśanām /
GK19akadambu:55: paraṃ vyasmayata kṣmāpaḥ kṣaṇaṃ caivam acintayat // AKad_1.27 //
GK19akadambu:56: idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ kāntir ime lāvaṇyaśīkarāḥ /
GK19akadambu:57: martyatām api na prāhurmātaṅgatve tu kā kathā // AKad_1.28 //
GK19akadambu:58: tat satyam eva paśyāmi nūnaṃ mātaṅgamāyayā /
GK19akadambu:59: channeyaṃ devatā kācin martyalokam upāgatā // AKad_1.29 //
GK19akadambu:65: ratnānāṃ cāspadaṃ devo dugdhodadhir ivāparaḥ // AKad_1.32 //
GK19akadambu:67: prasādaḥ kriyatām asyā vihagaḥ parigṛhyatām // AKad_1.33 //
GK19akadambu:68: ity uktvā so 'grato rājñaḥ pañjaraṃ maṇikuṭṭime /
GK19akadambu:71: akarot pañjaraṃ tasmān niryayau ca vihaṅgamaḥ // AKad_1.35 //
GK19akadambu:72: utkṣipya dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ jayaśabdam udīrya saḥ /
GK19akadambu:75: carati vimuktāhāraṃ vratam iva bhavato ripustrīṇām // AKad_1.37 //
GK19akadambu:78: dṛṣṭaṃ bhavadbhir āścaryam īdṛśaṃ śrutam eva vā /
GK19akadambu:79: tiryaktve 'tiśayaḥ ko 'yaṃ yo manuṣyeṣu durlabhaḥ // AKad_1.39 //
GK19akadambu:81: mātaṅgeṣu ca kanyeyam ity āścaryaparamparā // AKad_1.40 //
GK19akadambu:83: bhavanty atiśayāḥ prāyaḥ prāṇināṃ ko 'tra vismayaḥ // AKad_1.41 //
GK19akadambu:87: vicitras tadvipākaś ca vicitraḥ kālaparyayaḥ // AKad_1.43 //
GK19akadambu:92: ity ādiśya pratīhārīṃ sabhām aujjhan mahīpatiḥ /
GK19akadambu:93: visasarja ca rājanyacakraṃ sevārtham āgatam // AKad_1.46 //
GK19akadambu:95: hutāgniḥ śrutaviprāśīr bhuktvā śayyāgṛhaṃ yayau // AKad_1.47 //
GK19akadambu:96: tatra paryaṅkam āruhya dhyātvaiva kim api kṣaṇam /
GK19akadambu:97: tam antaḥpuraviśrāntaṃ śukam ānāyayat punaḥ // AKad_1.48 //
GK19akadambu:100: vaiśampāyana ko nu tvaṃ kva jātaḥ kvoṣitaś ciram /
GK19akadambu:101: kutastyam idam īdṛk te kalāśāstrādikauśalam // AKad_1.50 //
GK19akadambu:102: manye jātismaraḥ ko 'pi bhavān bhūmim imāṃ gataḥ /
GK19akadambu:103: na hy asty atiśayaprāptir iyatī pakṣijātiṣu // AKad_1.51 //
GK19akadambu:104: kena vā bhavato nāma kṛtaṃ viprajanocitam /
GK19akadambu:106: kathaṃ caṇḍālasamparka iha vā katham āgamaḥ /
GK19akadambu:107: iti kārtsnyena vṛttāntam ātmano vaktum arhasi // AKad_1.53 //
GK19akadambu:109: kṣaṇaṃ buddhyānusaṃdhāya śuko vaktuṃ pracakrame // AKad_1.54 //
GK19akadambu:123: divā tāny abhinirvartya prāṇayātrām itas tataḥ /
GK19akadambu:124: tatrāgatya svanīḍeṣu sukhaṃ rātriṣu śerate // AKad_1.61 //
GK19akadambu:126: jāto 'ham ekas tanayas tayor vayasi paścime // AKad_1.62 //
GK19akadambu:128: tayaiva pañcatāṃ nītā jananī me durātmanaḥ // AKad_1.63 //
GK19akadambu:131: na śaśāka kvacid gantum ātmanaḥ prāṇavṛttaye /
GK19akadambu:132: māṃ vakṣasi nidhāyāsta nīḍa eva divāniśam // AKad_1.65 //
GK19akadambu:138: abhūt kalakalas tasminn araṇye yamadundubhiḥ // AKad_1.68 //
GK19akadambu:139: yugmam tatas tātorasaḥ kiñcid unnamayya śirodharām /
GK19akadambu:143: tato mṛtam ivātmānam utkhātam iva śālmalim /
GK19akadambu:146: murhūrtād eva tadvyādhair athāraṇyam apūryata // AKad_1.72 //
GK19akadambu:150: pulindaiḥ saha senānīḥ sa jagāma yathāgatam // AKad_1.74 //
GK19akadambu:151: eko jaratpulindas tu pāpas tatra vyalambata /
GK19akadambu:154: yamadūtīm iva dṛśaṃ sa dadau tatra śālmalau // AKad_1.76 //
GK19akadambu:155: sa durārohatāṃ tasya jānann api mahātaroḥ /
GK19akadambu:159: sa tu pāpas tam āruhya taruṃ nīḍanivāsinaḥ /
GK19akadambu:160: hatvā hatvā yathāśakti śukān bhūmāv apātayat // AKad_1.79 //
GK19akadambu:162: babhañja taṃ ca cikṣepa kṣitau vigatajīvitam // AKad_1.80 //
GK19akadambu:163: tadā mama na tacchoko nānyat kiñcic ca cetasi /
GK19akadambu:168: śukān gatāsūn ādāya vyādhān anusarann agāt // AKad_1.83 //
GK19akadambu:175: tathāpy atinirutsāhaḥ patan muhur itas tataḥ /
GK19akadambu:176: tam eva pāpakarmāṇaṃ śaṅkamānaḥ pade pade // AKad_1.87 //
GK19akadambu:177: ciraṃ hā tāta tāteti śocan kaṇṭhāntavartibhiḥ /
GK19akadambu:182: tatas tasmin sutas tasya sarasi snātum āgataḥ /
GK19akadambu:183: hārītanāmā māṃ tatra tadavasthaṃ vyalokayat // AKad_1.90 //
GK19akadambu:187: kṛtāhnikaś ca kāruṇyād anayat pitur āśramam // AKad_1.92 //
GK19akadambu:189: padaṃ sthiram iva nyastaṃ hṛdi me jīvitāśayā // AKad_1.93 //
GK19akadambu:191: iti pitre praṇamyāsau pāṇisthaṃ māmadarśayat // AKad_1.94 //
GK19akadambu:192: atha jābālim adrākṣaṃ sākṣād iva pitāmaham /
GK19akadambu:196: sa tu māṃ kṣaṇam udvīkṣya smayamāna ivāvadat /
GK19akadambu:197: idaṃ hi bhujyate 'nena phalaṃ svasyaiva karmaṇaḥ // AKad_1.97 //
GK19akadambu:200: vacas tad ākarṇya kutūhalākulāḥ sametya sarve munayas ta mabruvan /
GK19akadambu:201: babhūva ko 'yaṃ bhagavan bhavāntare kim asya vā duścaritaṃ tad ucyatām //
GK19akadambu:202: abhyarthito munibhir ity uparudhyamānas tān abravīt kuruta tāvadahaḥkriyāḥ svāḥ /
GK19akadambu:203: sāṃdhyaṃ vidhāya vidhim askhalitāvadhānam ākarṇayiṣyatha kathāṃ pṛthum etadīyām // AKad_1.100
GK19akadambu:204: uktās tathā bhagavatā munayo nijena karmakrameṇa divasaṃ gamayāṃbabhūvuḥ /

GK19akadambu:207: dvitīyaḥ sargaḥ atha saṃdhyāsamādhyantāḥ samāpya munayaḥ kriyāḥ /

GK19akadambu:212: siñcann iva karair indur udagādāśramasthalīm // AKad_2.3 //
GK19akadambu:218: nidhir ujjayinī nāma nagarī guṇasampadām // AKad_2.6 //
GK19akadambu:220: te 'pi yām abhipaśyantaḥ sukhaṃ tāsu na śerate // AKad_2.7 //

GK19akadambu:229: amātyaḥ śukanāsākhyo brāhmaṇas tasya cābhavat // AKad_2.11 //
GK19akadambu:231: tasmin mantriṇi tadbhāraṃ nicikṣepa bharakṣame // AKad_2.12 //
GK19akadambu:232: tathā ca pālayāmāsa sa mantrī sakalāḥ prajāḥ /

GK19akadambu:241: asamāptajigīṣasya tā eva tu viḍambanāḥ // AKad_2.17 //

GK19akadambu:312: dineṣv atha vyatīteṣu keṣucid garbham agrahīt /

GK19akadambu:314: tābhyaḥ prādāt sa vāsāṃsi citrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca /

GK19akadambu:321: dṛṣṭvā lokeṣu māti sma na trivikramavat triṣu // AKad_2.57 //
GK19akadambu:322: śukanāsas tu rājānaṃ kaṇṭhe jagrāha nirbharam /

GK19akadambu:325: indor udayarāgārdraṃ navaṃ bimbam ivoditam // AKad_2.59 //
GK19akadambu:327: haste bhūpālam ālambya harṣagarbham abhāṣata // AKad_2.60 //
GK19akadambu:328: ayaṃ śaṅkha idaṃ cakram iyam ūrṇedam ambujam /

GK19akadambu:330: yo 'sau svapne tvayā dṛṣṭaś candro devīmukhaṃ viśan /

GK19akadambu:333: śukanāsasya rājñaś ca harṣābdhir vavṛdhetarām // AKad_2.63 //
GK19akadambu:337: uttarīyaṃ jahārāsya pūrṇapātram iti svayam // AKad_2.65 //
GK19akadambu:338: uvāca cainaṃ paśyedaṃ sukhasyopari naḥ sukham /

GK19akadambu:341: sahaiva pātratāṃ nītau yad āvāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ // AKad_2.67 //
GK19akadambu:346: rājā tu svagṛhe kelivimardaṃ vīkṣya tādṛśam /

GK19akadambu:349: vilāsavatyāṃ snātāyāṃ śucau kāla upasthite // AKad_2.71 //
GK19akadambu:352: sa bhūṣaṇāni vāsāṃsi varṣan parijane śiśoḥ /
GK19akadambu:353: candrāpīḍa iti svapnasadṛśaṃ nāma nirmame // AKad_2.73 //
GK19akadambu:355: vaiśampāyana ity ātmasūnor nāma praṇītavān // AKad_2.74 //
GK19akadambu:359: avyaktavarṇair ālāpair aharat sa tayor manaḥ // AKad_2.76 //
GK19akadambu:368: nṛpatis tv agamad draṣṭuṃ putraṃ gurukule sthitam /
GK19akadambu:369: prārthito 'pi sa tanmātrā nainam ānāyayad gṛham // AKad_2.81 //
GK19akadambu:374: prauḍhaḥ kalāsu sarvāsu dakṣaḥ sarveṣu karmasu /
GK19akadambu:376: krameṇa vardhamānaś ca sa vyāyāmam asevata /
GK19akadambu:382: rājā tu taṃ sutaṃ buddhvā kṛtārthaṃ guruveśmanaḥ /
GK19akadambu:385: puṇye 'hni prāhiṇot putram ānetuṃ kṛtamaṅgalaḥ // AKad_2.89 //
GK19akadambu:387: visasarja ca tenaiva saha putrānuvartinam // AKad_2.90 //
GK19akadambu:389: jitoccaiḥśravasaṃ tais tair ananyasadṛśair guṇaiḥ // AKad_2.91 //
GK19akadambu:391: adrākṣīdrājaputraṃ taṃ praṇanāma ca sādaram // AKad_2.92 //
GK19akadambu:392: ācacakṣe ca rājājñāṃ gṛham āgamyatām iti /
GK19akadambu:397: indrāyudhaṃ praveśyāśvaṃ punar āha balāhakaḥ // AKad_2.95 //
GK19akadambu:400: candrāpīḍas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā turaṅgamam anuttamam /
GK19akadambu:401: paraṃ vismayam āpede ciraṃ caivam acintayat // AKad_2.97 //
GK19akadambu:402: hṛdayaṃ me bravīty evaṃ naiṣa satyaṃ turaṅgamaḥ /
GK19akadambu:403: ko 'pi kenāpi śāpena nūnaṃ turagatāṃ gataḥ // AKad_2.98 //
GK19akadambu:407: tejasām ākṛter vāpi na sāmānyeṣu vājiṣu // AKad_2.100 //
GK19akadambu:412: yo 'si so 'si namas tubhyam ārohātikramas tvayā /
GK19akadambu:413: marṣaṇīyo 'yam asmākam āruroheti taṃ vadan // AKad_2.103 //
GK19akadambu:414: tilakam sa indrāyudham āruhya vainateyam ivācyutaḥ /
GK19akadambu:415: api trijagatīṃ kṛtsnāṃ mene hastagatām iva // AKad_2.104 //
GK19akadambu:417: rājaputraiḥ parivṛto viveśa nagarīṃ śanaiḥ // AKad_2.105 //
GK19akadambu:418: tam atha purataruṇyo rājamārgeṇa yāntaṃ dadṛśur atulakāntiṃ saudhavātāyanasthāḥ /
GK19akadambu:419: vyapagatagurulajjāḥ sambhramotkampitāṅgyaḥ smarajanitavikārair locanair arcayantyaḥ // AKad_2.106
GK19akadambu:421: tṛtīyaḥ sargas sa prāpya nṛpatidvāram avatīrya turaṅgamāt /
GK19akadambu:424: nyastajānuḥ kṣitau mūrdhnā vavande caraṇau pituḥ // AKad_3.2 //
GK19akadambu:425: āliliṅga ca taṃ rājā cucumba śirasi kṣaṇāt /
GK19akadambu:426: grahītum aicchad utsaṅge sa tu bhūmāv upāviśat // AKad_3.3 //
GK19akadambu:427: draṣṭuṃ punaḥ punaḥ spraṣṭum atṛptenāpi bhūbhujā /
GK19akadambu:428: visṛṣṭo 'tha kṣaṇaṃ sthitvā mātaraṃ vandituṃ yayau // AKad_3.4 //
GK19akadambu:430: praṇamya jananīḥ sarvā nandayāmāsa vandanaiḥ // AKad_3.5 //
GK19akadambu:432: śukanāsam atha draṣṭum ayāsīt tasya mandiram // AKad_3.6 //
GK19akadambu:433: dvāri vājinam utsṛjya praviśya praśrayeṇa tam /
GK19akadambu:434: pitṛvat praṇanāmāsau maulinā medinīṃ spṛśan // AKad_3.7 //
GK19akadambu:435: namantam enam utthāpya svayam utthāya sādaram /
GK19akadambu:436: śukanāsas tu jagrāha kaṇṭhe pulakitānanaḥ // AKad_3.8 //
GK19akadambu:438: candrāpīḍaḥ kṣitāv eva tasya nyaviśatāgrataḥ // AKad_3.9 //
GK19akadambu:439: śukanāsaṃ ca muñcantam āsanaṃ svaṃ nyavārayat /
GK19akadambu:440: tatra kṣaṇam iva sthitvā draṣṭum āgān manoramām // AKad_3.10 //
GK19akadambu:444: sa vaiśampāyanasyāpi tādṛg eva gṛhadvaye // AKad_3.12 //
GK19akadambu:445: na kaścana sutasnehe viśeṣaś ca tayor abhūt /
GK19akadambu:446: mantriṇo rājaputre vā mantriputra nṛpasya vā // AKad_3.13 //
GK19akadambu:449: susaṃniveśam ālokya reme tatra cirāya saḥ /
GK19akadambu:452: mātrā visṛṣṭa āgatya kañcukī tam abhāṣata // AKad_3.16 //
GK19akadambu:454: kenāpi daivayogena paribhraṣṭā pitur gṛhāt // AKad_3.17 //
GK19akadambu:455: bālaiva vardhitā devyā svayam antaḥpure nije /
GK19akadambu:458: ity uktvopāharat kanyāṃ vinītāṃ priyadarśanām // AKad_19 //
GK19akadambu:459: tilakam sā tu tenārpitā kanyā tataḥ prabhṛti taṃ tathā /
GK19akadambu:460: asevata yathā cāsya nijaṃ cittam ivābhavat // AKad_3.20 //
GK19akadambu:462: tutoṣa ca guṇair asyāḥ śīlācāranayādibhiḥ // AKad_3.21 //
GK19akadambu:463: kiyatsv api vyatīteṣu divaseṣv atha pārthivaḥ /
GK19akadambu:470: nālpam apy upadeṣṭavyam asti sthiramates tava // AKad_3.25 //
GK19akadambu:471: kiṃ tu lokottarā lakṣmīr abhirāmam idaṃ vapuḥ /
GK19akadambu:472: navaṃ vayaḥ parā śaktir iti durviṣaho bharaḥ // AKad_3.26 //
GK19akadambu:474: viralās te vikārāya na yeṣāṃ tatparigrahaḥ // AKad_3.27 //
GK19akadambu:476: karoti bhaktavidveṣam asamaḥ śrīkṛto jvaraḥ // AKad_3.28 //
GK19akadambu:477: na paśyanti na śṛṇvanti nāpekṣante hitāhitam /
GK19akadambu:478: na vidmaḥ kiṃ nu ceṣṭante kaṣṭaṃ śrīviplutā narāḥ // AKad_3.29 //
GK19akadambu:480: hyo 'pi yatroṣitā lakṣmīs tatraivādya na dṛśyate // AKad_3.30 //
GK19akadambu:482: lakṣmīr nidhātuṃ śaknoti na kvacin nirbharaṃ padam // AKad_3.31 //
GK19akadambu:483: śrīḥ sapatnīm iva dveṣṭi dṛṣṭiṃ satpathavartinīm /
GK19akadambu:484: tāṃ vinā yatra tatraiva patanty andhā iveśvarāḥ // AKad_3.32 //
GK19akadambu:486: dhūrtair ete hi bhujyante hṛdayānupraveśibhiḥ // AKad_3.33 //
GK19akadambu:488: tair eva hi pravartyante mukhamādhuryapaṇḍitaiḥ // AKad_3.34 //
GK19akadambu:490: akasmāt pralayaṃ yānti gītaraktā mṛgā iva // AKad_3.35 //
GK19akadambu:491: viṣayeṣv atikaṣṭo 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ strīti nāma yaḥ /
GK19akadambu:492: jīvaty anyaiḥ kilākṛṣṭas tenākṛṣṭo na jīvati // AKad_3.36 //
GK19akadambu:494: sādhuṣv abhimukho nityaṃ mahatīṃ śriyam aśnute // AKad_3.37 //
GK19akadambu:495: sa tvaṃ na vañcyase dhūrtair na sādhubhir upekṣyase /
GK19akadambu:496: yathā na bādhyase kāmaiḥ prayatethās tathā sadā // AKad_3.38 //
GK19akadambu:497: kāmaṃ bhavān prakṛtyaiva dhīraḥ pitrā ca saṃskṛtaḥ /
GK19akadambu:498: tvadguṇeṣv atisaṃtoṣo mukharīkurute sma mām // AKad_3.39 //
GK19akadambu:499: yugarāja dhuraṃ pitrā kalpitām udvaha sthirām /
GK19akadambu:500: vijitām api cānena punar jaya vasuṃdharām // AKad_3.40 //
GK19akadambu:502: candrāpīḍas tu tadvāgbhir alaṅkṛta ivābhavat // AKad_3.41 //
GK19akadambu:504: yauvarājye priyaṃ putram abhyaṣiñcan mahīpatiḥ // AKad_3.42 //
GK19akadambu:510: dadau digvijaye yātrāṃ yuvarājo nṛpājñayā // AKad_3.45 //
GK19akadambu:516: stutas tāraṃ paṭhadbhiś ca sūtamāgadhabandibhiḥ // AKad_3.48 //
GK19akadambu:518: pitarau śukanāsaṃ ca praṇamya niragādgṛhāt // AKad_3.49 //
GK19akadambu:521: śṛṇvan nagaryāḥ pūrveṇa dvāreṇa niriyāya saḥ // AKad_3.50 //
GK19akadambu:525: anyatra patralekhāṃ ca paśyann aśvaratīsthitām // AKad_3.52 //
GK19akadambu:527: citraṃ nivāsam adhyāsta siprākūle prakalpitam // AKad_3.53 //
GK19akadambu:532: rajasā ca tadutthena sthagayan gaganasthitān // AKad_3.55 //
GK19akadambu:534: avaśān utkhanan kāṃścid utkhātān pratiropayan // AKad_3.56 //
GK19akadambu:536: dasyūn utsādayan daṇḍaiḥ sādhūn saṃmānayan dhanaiḥ // AKad_3.57 //
GK19akadambu:538: navāni nijacihnāni tatra tatra pravartayan // AKad_3.58 //
GK19akadambu:540: sa babhrāma prabandhena māndhāteva vasuṃdharām // AKad_3.59 //
GK19akadambu:541: kulakam jigāya prathamaṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ tadanu dakṣiṇām /
GK19akadambu:542: tataḥ pratīcīṃ paścāc ca pratāpanidhiruttarām // AKad_3.60 //
GK19akadambu:544: sa suvarṇapuraṃ jitvā daṇḍaṃ jagrāha helayā // AKad_3.61 //
GK19akadambu:547: ekadā tu sa tatsthānād āruhyendrāyudhaṃ vane /
GK19akadambu:550: āditsuḥ prerayāmāsa tāv eva prati vājinam // AKad_3.64 //
GK19akadambu:555: tau ca parvatam ārūḍhāv agratas tasya kiṃnarau /
GK19akadambu:556: tatas tadgrahaṇākāṅkṣāṃ hṛdayād utsasarja saḥ // AKad_3.67 //
GK19akadambu:557: aśaknod anusartuṃ ca kaścit parijano na tam /
GK19akadambu:558: tārkṣyeṇāpy anugamyeta dhāvann indrāyudhaḥ kutaḥ // AKad_3.68 //
GK19akadambu:560: dṛṣṭvaikākinam ātmānaṃ śvasantaṃ ca turaṅgamam // AKad_3.69 //
GK19akadambu:563: aho kim api me maurkhyam asthānābhiniveśinaḥ /
GK19akadambu:564: yad ātmā bālakeneva vyartham āyāsito mayā // AKad_3.71 //
GK19akadambu:565: agṛhītena ko vārthaḥ ko 'rthaḥ prāptena vāmunā /
GK19akadambu:568: na cātra labhyate martyo mama mārgasya deśikaḥ // AKad_3.73 //
GK19akadambu:570: kailāsasaṃnikṛṣṭeyam iha martyasya kā kathā // AKad_3.74 //
GK19akadambu:572: na syur yadanusāreṇa yāsyāmi śibiraṃ nijam // AKad_3.75 //
GK19akadambu:574: gantavyaṃ kiṃ tu madhyāhnasamayo 'yam upasthitaḥ // AKad_3.76 //
GK19akadambu:575: anubhūto 'timātraṃ ca khedas tad iha sāmpratam /
GK19akadambu:576: labdhvā kuto 'py apastābhir yāsyāmi vigataśramaḥ // AKad_3.77 //
GK19akadambu:577: iti saṃcintya pānīyam anveṣitum itas tataḥ /
GK19akadambu:578: paribhraman ghanasnigdhaṃ śākhināṃ khaṇḍam aikṣata // AKad_3.78 //
GK19akadambu:582: sa panthānam athāpaśyad ambhasām anumāpakam // AKad_3.80 //
GK19akadambu:591: svayaṃ sasnau papau vāri bubhuje bisakandalīḥ /
GK19akadambu:599: utthāya candrāpīḍo 'tha tām eva diśam abhyagāt // AKad_3.88 //
GK19akadambu:605: bhagavantam umākāntaṃ dadarśa praṇanāma ca // AKad_3.91 //
GK19akadambu:609: sākṣāl lakṣmīr iva kṣīrajaladher madhyavartinī // AKad_3.93 //
GK19akadambu:615: keyaṃ syāt kanyakā nāsyā divyatāṃ prati saṃśayaḥ // AKad_3.96 //
GK19akadambu:617: nāntardhānam iyaṃ gacchen na vā gaganam utpatet /
GK19akadambu:618: na maunam avalambeta martyasaṃdarśanena vā // AKad_3.97 //
GK19akadambu:622: sātha gītaṃ samāpayya vinidhāya ca vallakīm /
GK19akadambu:624: atithe svāgataṃ te 'stu saumya viśramyatām iha /
GK19akadambu:625: prāpto 'si svām imāṃ bhūmim ita āgamyatām iti // AKad_3.100 //
GK19akadambu:626: candrāpīḍas tad ākarṇya bahv ātmānam amanyata /
GK19akadambu:627: vrajantīm anu vavrāja devatāvat praṇamya tām // AKad_3.101 //
GK19akadambu:633: sā ca vijñātavṛttāntā nirjagāma tato bahiḥ // AKad_3.104 //
GK19akadambu:634: gṛhītabhikṣāpātrā ca kṣaṇam āsta taror adhaḥ /
GK19akadambu:635: āpūryata svayaṃ śīrṇaiḥ phalais tad amṛtopamaiḥ // AKad_3.105 //
GK19akadambu:637: anvatiṣṭhad vacas tasyāḥ sa ca vismayamānadhīḥ // AKad_3.106 //
GK19akadambu:640: āgatya ca punas tasminn upaviṣṭā mṛgājine /
GK19akadambu:642: api nāma svavṛttāntaṃ madvad eṣāpi varṇayet /
GK19akadambu:643: pṛṣṭety evaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dadhyau candrāpīḍaḥ sakautukaḥ // AKad_3.109 //
GK19akadambu:644: dṛṣṭvā cāsyāḥ praśamamadhurām ākṛtiṃ bhāvaśuddhiṃ dākṣiṇyaṃ ca prakṛtisaralaṃ labdhavākyāvakāśaḥ
GK19akadambu:645: ātmodantaṃ niyatam akhilaṃ vakṣyati prārthiteyaṃ candrāpīḍaḥ kṣaṇam atha kṛtapraśnasampratyayo 'bhūt // AKad_3.110 //
GK19akadambu:646: iti śrīvipaścidvarāgragaṇyācāryabhaṭṭaśrījayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ
GK19akadambu:654: puṇyena janmanā vaṃśo bhagavatyā vibhūṣitaḥ // AKad_4.4 //
GK19akadambu:662: iyam apy ākṛtir nāma duḥkhair yad abhibhūyate // AKad_4.8 //
GK19akadambu:664: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya vyāhartum upacakrame // AKad_4.9 //
GK19akadambu:666: pāpāyā mandabhāgyāyā vṛttāntena śrutena te // AKad_4.10 //
GK19akadambu:668: tad idaṃ varṇyate sarvam ākarṇaya yathākramam // AKad_4.11 //
GK19akadambu:669: suprasiddham idaṃ tāvat tava śrutipathaṃ gatam /
GK19akadambu:670: yat santy apsaraso nāma surasadmani kanyakāḥ // AKad_4.12 //
GK19akadambu:674: kanye munir ariṣṭeti dve dakṣasya babhūvatuḥ // AKad_4.14 //
GK19akadambu:680: rūḍhaṃ parasparaṃ prema tayor gandharvarājayoḥ // AKad_4.17 //
GK19akadambu:682: hemakūṭa iti khyātaḥ sa nivāsas tayor dvayoḥ // AKad_4.18 //
GK19akadambu:684: gandharvās tau ca visrambhabhūmir janmadviṣaḥ parā // AKad_4.19 //
GK19akadambu:685: atha yat somasambhūtam ekam apsarasāṃ kulam /
GK19akadambu:686: gaurī nāmodabhūt kanyā tasmin pratikṛtir vidhoḥ // AKad_4.20 //
GK19akadambu:688: tato yathārthaṃ nāmāpa sarvathā haṃsagāminī // AKad_4.21 //
GK19akadambu:690: tayor udabhavat sūnur eko 'pi na mahātmanoḥ // AKad_4.22 //
GK19akadambu:692: udabhūvaṃ tayor asya duḥkhabhārasya bhājanam // AKad_4.23 //
GK19akadambu:696: cakre varṇānurūpaṃ sa mahāśveteti nāma me // AKad_4.25 //
GK19akadambu:701: yugalakam atha bālyāt paraṃ prāpam ahaṃ nānārasāspadam /
GK19akadambu:706: sakhībhiḥ saha paśyantī kānane vyaciraṃ ciram // AKad_4.30 //
GK19akadambu:716: tataḥ pravṛttam āmodaṃ samāghrātavatī muhuḥ // AKad_4.35 //
GK19akadambu:720: tataḥ kusumabāṇena nītāsi vaśam ātmanaḥ // AKad_4.37 //
GK19akadambu:726: patito gocare citram alaṅghyā bhavitavyatā // AKad_4.40 //
GK19akadambu:731: bhagavan kathyatāṃ ko 'yaṃ kimākhyaḥ kim ihāgataḥ /
GK19akadambu:732: karṇe ca nihitānena kasyeyaṃ mañjarī taroḥ // AKad_4.43 //
GK19akadambu:734: śvetaketur iti khyāto rūpeṇāpratimo muniḥ // AKad_4.44 //
GK19akadambu:736: nityaṃ saṃnihitā tatra lakṣmīr enaṃ vyalokayat // AKad_4.45 //
GK19akadambu:739: udapādi tadaivāsya kumāraḥ sa tayā śriyā /
GK19akadambu:740: tava putro 'yam ity uktvā nyavedi śvetaketave // AKad_4.47 //
GK19akadambu:741: so 'pi yogadṛśā dṛṣṭvā yathāvat sutam agrahīt /
GK19akadambu:742: nāma janmocitaṃ cāsya puṇḍarīka iti vyadhāt // AKad_4.48 //
GK19akadambu:744: atīte bālabhāve ca nyayuṅkta tapase pitā // AKad_4.49 //
GK19akadambu:745: ayaṃ sa puṇḍarīkas te varṇitaḥ śṛṇu mañjarīm /
GK19akadambu:748: tvadākṛter alaṅkāras tulyo 'yam iti sādaram // AKad_4.51 //
GK19akadambu:752: iti tasmin vadaty eva capale gṛhyatām iyam /
GK19akadambu:753: kim anena tava praśnalobhenety abhidhāya mām // AKad_4.53 //
GK19akadambu:755: apanīya nijāt karṇān mama karṇāvataṃsatām // AKad_4.54 //
GK19akadambu:758: tena praskhalitā hastād akṣamālā na lakṣitā // AKad_4.55 //
GK19akadambu:759: aprāptaiva ca sā bhūmiṃ gṛhītā sahasā mayā /
GK19akadambu:760: asminn avasare chattragrāhiṇī mām avocata // AKad_4.56 //
GK19akadambu:761: snātā devī ciraṃ bhartṛdārike gamyatām iti /
GK19akadambu:762: tataḥ pratinivṛttāyāṃ mayi taṃ sa sakhāvadat // AKad_4.57 //
GK19akadambu:763: vayasya kim idaṃ cetas tava viplutam īdṛśam /
GK19akadambu:764: hṛtām apy anayājñāsīr akṣamālāṃ na kanyayā // AKad_4.58 //
GK19akadambu:765: hṛtā nāmeyam anayā hṛdayaṃ nanu rakṣyatām /
GK19akadambu:766: tato 'sau punar āgatya kṛtakopam ivāvadat // AKad_4.59 //
GK19akadambu:767: apahṛtyākṣamālāṃ me kva cauri nanu gamyate /
GK19akadambu:768: atha mandaṃ vihasyeva mayāsya nihitā kare // AKad_4.60 //
GK19akadambu:772: sakhībhir api me dṛṣṭam idaṃ cāpalam ity aham /
GK19akadambu:774: atrāham asvatantraiva kṣaṇaṃ snātvā yathā tathā /
GK19akadambu:775: agaccham ambayā sākaṃ tadguṇādhyāyinī gṛham // AKad_4.63 //
GK19akadambu:778: kva gatāsmi kim uktāsmi tena ko 'sāvahaṃ ca kā /
GK19akadambu:779: kim idaṃ kaḥ prakāro 'yam iti nājñāsiṣaṃ tadā // AKad_4.65 //
GK19akadambu:781: priyā taralikā nāma praviśyedam athābravīt // AKad_4.66 //
GK19akadambu:782: karṇe munikumāreṇa kṛtā te yena mañjarī /
GK19akadambu:783: tvayyāgatāyāṃ pṛṣṭāsmi svarūpaṃ tena tāvakam // AKad_4.67 //
GK19akadambu:784: tacchrutvā ca svayaṃ tena likhitvā vastrapaṭṭikā /
GK19akadambu:785: ekākinyai tvayā tasyai deyetyuktvā samarpitā // AKad_4.68 //
GK19akadambu:786: tatas taralikāyās tāṃ hastād ādāya paṭṭikām /
GK19akadambu:787: tasyāṃ tu likhitām āryām imām aham avācayam // AKad_4.69 //
GK19akadambu:789: haṃsa iva darśitāśo mānasajanmā tvayā nītaḥ // AKad_4.70 //
GK19akadambu:791: mohāyāryāpy anāryeva sutarāṃ manaso mama // AKad_4.71 //
GK19akadambu:792: vada tena kim uktāsi sa kim uktas tvayāpi vā /
GK19akadambu:793: tadantike ca visrabdham uṣiṭāsi kiyacciram // AKad_4.72 //
GK19akadambu:794: itthaṃ taralikāṃ tat tad ālapantī punaḥ punaḥ /
GK19akadambu:795: kāñcid ahnas tato mātrām unmattevātyavāhayam // AKad_4.73 //
GK19akadambu:797: bhartṛdārikayā dṛṣṭau yau tau munikumārakau // AKad_4.74 //
GK19akadambu:799: śīghraṃ praveśayety uktā mayā tadabhiśaṅkayā // AKad_4.75 //
GK19akadambu:800: sā ca praveśayāmāsa tasya taṃ sahacāriṇam /
GK19akadambu:804: dṛṣṭiṃ taralikāyāṃ sa vaktukāmaḥ kṣaṇaṃ nyadhāt /
GK19akadambu:805: mayā so 'jñāyi pṛṣṭas tu lajjamāna ivābhyadhāt // AKad_4.78 //
GK19akadambu:806: ahaṃ kapiñjalo nāma tasya bālasuhṛn muneḥ /
GK19akadambu:807: na vāk pravartate me 'sminn anabhyasta ivādhvani // AKad_4.79 //
GK19akadambu:808: kvāyaṃ munijanaḥ śāntaḥ kva cāmī rāgavibhramāḥ /
GK19akadambu:810: tad ucyate prayātāyāṃ rājaputri tadā tvayi /
GK19akadambu:811: haste muktāvalīṃ bibhrat sa madantikam āgataḥ // AKad_4.81 //
GK19akadambu:813: vihasya sa mayā noktaḥ kiñcic cintopaśāntaye // AKad_4.82 //
GK19akadambu:815: na so 'sty upāyo mantro vā yo mayā nābhyadhīyata // AKad_4.83 //
GK19akadambu:817: kṣaṇam antarhito mattaḥ sutarāṃ mām apīḍayat // AKad_4.84 //
GK19akadambu:818: kṛcchrād iva mayā labdho vicitya sakalaṃ vanam /
GK19akadambu:819: anya eva sa saṃvṛtto vacasāṃ yo na gocaraḥ // AKad_4.85 //
GK19akadambu:824: trapayā tadavastho 'pi sa kiñcid vaktum akṣamaḥ /
GK19akadambu:825: sabāṣpamalināṃ dīnāṃ mayi dṛṣṭim apātayat // AKad_4.88 //
GK19akadambu:828: ataḥ paraṃ tu sāmarthyagatārthā mama yā giraḥ /
GK19akadambu:829: kaṇṭhe viparivartante nūnaṃ tvam api vettha tāḥ // AKad_4.90 //
GK19akadambu:830: iti tasmin vadaty eva praviśya prāha kañcukī /
GK19akadambu:831: tvam asvasthaśarīreti jñātvā devī samāgatā // AKad_4.91 //
GK19akadambu:833: na sa prativacaḥ kiñcin māmakīnam apaikṣata // AKad_4.92 //
GK19akadambu:834: taduktāṃ tu daśāṃ tasya janasyāvetya tādṛśīm /
GK19akadambu:835: āgatāṃ nāgatāṃ vāpi nāham ambām alakṣayam // AKad_4.93 //
GK19akadambu:836: tataḥ kamalinīṃ raktāṃ tyaktvā kvāpi gate ravau /
GK19akadambu:837: udite sarvathā vāme vidhau vaidhuryadāyini // AKad_4.94 //
GK19akadambu:839: punas taralikām eva sāśrukaṇṭham avādiṣam // AKad_4.95 //
GK19akadambu:840: ahaṃ yathā tathā vāpi bhaveyaṃ sa tu matkṛte /
GK19akadambu:841: kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīty eṣā cintā dalayatīva mām // AKad_4.96 //
GK19akadambu:843: itaḥ kāmo vasanto 'pi viraho maraṇād bhayam // AKad_4.97 //
GK19akadambu:844: vada kiṃ karavāṇy atra muhyatīva mano mama /
GK19akadambu:845: mā bhūn me varake vipraprāṇabādhena majjanam // AKad_4.98 //
GK19akadambu:847: jahāra cetanāṃ mūrchā nidreva nayanadyutim // AKad_4.99 //
GK19akadambu:850: kiṃ śāstraṃ guravaḥ ke ca kā lajjā kā kulasthitiḥ /
GK19akadambu:851: rakṣyantām ātmanaḥ prāṇā yūnas tasya ca sarvathā // AKad_4.101 //
GK19akadambu:853: śāstreṣu paṭhitas tasmāt tūrṇam uttiṣṭha gamyatām // AKad_4.102 //
GK19akadambu:855: tām ekām agrataḥ kṛtvā nirgatāham alakṣitā // AKad_4.103 //
GK19akadambu:857: tadā me dakṣiṇaṃ cakṣur aspandata muhur muhuḥ // AKad_4.104 //
GK19akadambu:861: puṇḍarīka kva yāto 'si śūnyaṃ kṛtvā jagattrayam // AKad_4.106 //
GK19akadambu:862: hā hato 'smi vilīno 'smi dagdho 'smi karavāṇi kim /
GK19akadambu:863: gatvā tātasya vakṣyāmi śvetaketoḥ kim agrataḥ // AKad_4.107 //
GK19akadambu:865: hṛtā me suhṛdo 'muṣya prāṇavṛttir api tvayā // AKad_4.108 //
GK19akadambu:866: vayasya dehi me vācaṃ na jīvāmi tvayā vinā /
GK19akadambu:872: kiṃ cireṇāgatāsīti ruṣitveva tathā sthitam // AKad_4.111 //
GK19akadambu:873: etāvad uktvā mūrchādhiṃ svavṛttāntam ataḥ param /
GK19akadambu:874: vivakṣantīva sā kanyā nipapāta śilātale // AKad_4.112 //
GK19akadambu:878: toyaiś ca śiśirasvacchaiḥ saṃjñām enām ajigrahat // AKad_4.114 //
GK19akadambu:879: avāpya cetanām eṣā smṛtvā tadvyasanaṃ nijam /
GK19akadambu:880: tad evānubhavantīva ruroda vilalāpa ca // AKad_4.115 //
GK19akadambu:881: tarūṇām apy abhajyanta hṛdayāni tadā śucā /
GK19akadambu:884: āstāṃ na śakyate vaktuṃ śrotuṃ cānyad ataḥ param // AKad_4.117 //
GK19akadambu:885: katham apy upasaṃhṛtya śokāvegaṃ tu sāvadat /
GK19akadambu:886: kim ataḥ param asty anyad vācyaṃ śrotavyam eva vā // AKad_4.118 //
GK19akadambu:888: rājaputra bibharmīdaṃ tad āścaryaṃ bravīmi te // AKad_4.119 //
GK19akadambu:890: na kācin maraṇādanyā mayāgrāhi pratikriyā // AKad_4.120 //
GK19akadambu:892: niriyāya ca candramaṇḍalāt puruṣaḥ ko 'pi himopamadyutiḥ // AKad_4.121 //
GK19akadambu:893: so 'vatīrya gaganān mahītale taṃ nidhāya bhujapañjarāntare /
GK19akadambu:894: utpatan divam udārayā girā mām avocata piteva sāntvayan // AKad_4.122 //
GK19akadambu:895: virama maraṇodyogād asmāt priyeṇa tavāmunā punar api mahāśvete vatse bhaviṣyati saṃgamaḥ /
GK19akadambu:896: iti giram ahaṃ tasmāc chrutvā sasambhramavismayā kim idam iti taṃ tatrāpṛcchaṃ prasṛtya kapiñjalam priyasakham apahṛtya kvādhunā gacchasīti sphuritavikaṭakopāṭopamuktordhvadṛṣṭiḥ /
GK19akadambu:897: mama vacanam adattvā kiñcid evātivegā kṛtaparikarabandhaḥ so 'py agād antarikṣam // AKad_4.124
GK19akadambu:898: paśyantyāṃ mayi te trayo 'pi viviśuḥ śītatviṣo maṇḍalaṃ
GK19akadambu:900: tātenaitya tataḥ prabhṛty aham ihāsīnātha netuṃ gṛhaṃ yatnenāpi na pāriteti suciraṃ sthitvā gataḥ svān gṛhān // AKad_4.125 //
GK19akadambu:901: iti śrīvipaścidvarāgragaṇyācāryabhaṭṭaśrījayantasūnor abhinandasya kṛtau kādambarīkathāsāre caturthaḥ sargaḥ
GK19akadambu:905: sakampavismayo 'py antas tām avocata sāntvayan // AKad_5.2 //
GK19akadambu:908: sā tvamarhasi kalyāṇi na śokaṃ kartum īdṛśam /
GK19akadambu:909: āśvāsitāsi devena nūnaṃ candramasā svayam // AKad_5.4 //
GK19akadambu:911: nirgatya tatraiva viśan niśi sambhāvyate naraḥ // AKad_5.5 //
GK19akadambu:915: nāsty eva tasya tapasām asādhyaṃ nāma kiñcana // AKad_5.7 //
GK19akadambu:917: mahāśvetāṃ samāśvāsya punaḥ papraccha tām asau // AKad_5.8 //
GK19akadambu:918: sā te taralikā nāma visrambhanibhṛtā sakhī /
GK19akadambu:919: gatā bhagavati kvādya na hi sā tvāṃ vimuñcati // AKad_5.9 //
GK19akadambu:921: śṛṇvannāpi nimittaṃ te yathā sā prahitā mayā // AKad_5.10 //
GK19akadambu:923: varṇito yena devo 'yaṃ pratyaṣṭāpi maheśvaraḥ // AKad_5.11 //
GK19akadambu:924: yena khānitam atyaccham acchodākhyam idaṃ saraḥ /
GK19akadambu:925: yena caitrarathaṃ nāma kṛtam etac ca kānanam // AKad_5.12 //
GK19akadambu:927: mahiṣī madirā nāma jīvitād api vallabhā // AKad_5.13 //
GK19akadambu:930: tayā saha mahat prema bālyāt prabhṛti me tathā /
GK19akadambu:931: yathaikam eva jānāti jano jīvitam āvayoḥ // AKad_5.15 //
GK19akadambu:933: sāgrahīn niyamaṃ bālā vāryamāṇāpi bandhubhiḥ // AKad_5.16 //
GK19akadambu:935: tāvan mayā na kartavyaṃ pāṇigrahaṇam ātmanaḥ // AKad_5.17 //
GK19akadambu:936: ato yathā yathā tasyā yauvanaśrīr vijṛmbhate /
GK19akadambu:937: tathā tathā tato dhatte khedaṃ citrarathaḥ param // AKad_5.18 //
GK19akadambu:938: saṃdiṣṭaṃ tena me putri yatasvāvahitā tathā /
GK19akadambu:939: yathemaṃ durgrahagranthiṃ vimuñcati tava svasā // AKad_5.19 //
GK19akadambu:941: prahitā bahu saṃdiśya śvaś cāganteha sā punaḥ // AKad_5.20 //
GK19akadambu:943: candrāpīḍaḥ prayāte 'stam arke saṃdhyāvidhiṃ vyadhāt // AKad_5.21 //
GK19akadambu:947: kathām āścaryabahulāṃ tām eva dhyāyataś ciram // AKad_5.23 //
GK19akadambu:948: punaś cintayataḥ senāṃ vaiśampāyanam eva ca /
GK19akadambu:949: pattralekhāṃ ca sā rātrir gatā prāyeṇa jāgrataḥ // AKad_5.24 //
GK19akadambu:951: sapratyabhijñam aśvo 'pi bhṛśaṃ mānuṣavad dadau // AKad_5.25 //
GK19akadambu:953: samādher utthitāṃ buddhvā mahāśvetāṃ tadantikam // AKad_5.26 //
GK19akadambu:961: svasya svameva cedaṃ te manmanaḥ kiṃ parīkṣase // AKad_5.30 //
GK19akadambu:965: eṣa te pratisaṃdeśaḥ priyasakhyā niveditaḥ // AKad_5.32 //
GK19akadambu:967: cintayitvā kim apy antaś candrāpīḍam abhāṣata // AKad_5.33 //
GK19akadambu:969: tanoti sarvabhāvena niḥspṛhāṇām api spṛhām // AKad_5.34 //
GK19akadambu:971: tatra ko vā pratīkāraḥ svayaṃ madgamanād ṛte // AKad_5.35 //
GK19akadambu:972: ito na dūre gandharvarājadhānī tadadya tām /
GK19akadambu:976: candrāpīḍas tu tāṃ prāha bahūktvā bhavagaty alam /
GK19akadambu:977: anatikramaṇīyaṃ me munīnām api śāsanam // AKad_5.38 //
GK19akadambu:978: prāvartata tato gantuṃ sa mahāśvetayā saha /
GK19akadambu:979: padbhyām eva niyujyāśvaṃ prati keyūrakaṃ dṛśā // AKad_5.39 //
GK19akadambu:982: sa gatvā kiñcid adhvānaṃ candrāpīḍaḥ samāsadat /
GK19akadambu:985: sapta kakṣā atikramya kanyāntaḥpuram abhyagāt // AKad_5.42 //
GK19akadambu:993: sthitāṃ navasya lāvaṇyasindhor antas taraṅgiṇaḥ // AKad_5.46 //
GK19akadambu:997: tasyāṃ nirūpayann antar acintayad atha kṣaṇam // AKad_5.48 //
GK19akadambu:998: satyaṃ na kaścid āścaryanirmāṇeṣv avadhir vidheḥ /
GK19akadambu:999: īdṛśāny api ratnāni sraṣṭuṃ prabhavati sma yaḥ // AKad_5.49 //
GK19akadambu:1000: moghaṃ yāti hareḥ kālo lakṣmīṃ vakṣasi bibhrataḥ /
GK19akadambu:1001: dehārdhena vahan gaurīṃ vañcitaś candraśekharaḥ // AKad_5.50 //
GK19akadambu:1003: ananyakarmaṇā yena nityam eṣā na dṛśyate // AKad_5.51 //
GK19akadambu:1008: ayaṃ hi bhārate varṣe sārvabhaumasya bhūpateḥ /
GK19akadambu:1015: madano 'ntaḥ praviśyāsyā babandha hṛdaye padam // AKad_5.57 //
GK19akadambu:1025: nālakṣayata sā ratnavalayaṃ skhalitaṃ karāt // AKad_5.62 //
GK19akadambu:1035: rājaputryau yuvāṃ draṣṭuṃ devī nirvighnam icchati // AKad_5.67 //
GK19akadambu:1037: candrāpīḍaṃ sukhāsīnam āyātaṃ mātur antikam // AKad_5.68 //
GK19akadambu:1042: atha mandaprabhe bhānau bheje kādabarī nijam /
GK19akadambu:1047: samaṃ nipetus tasyāṃ ca kusumāyudhasāyakāḥ // AKad_5.73 //
GK19akadambu:1049: tallāvaṇyaṃ pibantīva madalekhām uvāca sā // AKad_5.74 //
GK19akadambu:1050: na mayā madano nāma kathāsvapi sakhi śrutaḥ /
GK19akadambu:1051: adya pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaḥ sa candrāpīḍavigrahaḥ // AKad_5.75 //
GK19akadambu:1053: atha cehānayantyāmuṃ sarvam uktam anakṣaram // AKad_5.76 //
GK19akadambu:1054: api nāma vikāro me tadānīṃ lakṣitas tayā /
GK19akadambu:1055: kiṃ vā na lakṣayed eṣā dṛṣṭamanmathavikriyā // AKad_5.77 //
GK19akadambu:1057: manasaḥ saṃharāmy eva sthūlām api yathātathā // AKad_5.78 //
GK19akadambu:1058: kiṃ tv asau śeṣahāro 'syāstulyaṃ maṇḍanam ākṛteḥ /
GK19akadambu:1059: urasy anicchato 'py asya tūrṇam āmucyatāṃ tvayā // AKad_5.79 //
GK19akadambu:1060: madalekhā gṛhītvā taṃ hāraṃ gatvā tadantike /
GK19akadambu:1061: tathovāca yathā tena pratyuktā sā na kiñcana // AKad_5.80 //
GK19akadambu:1066: kādambarī ciraṃ tv enam avalokya niśāgame /
GK19akadambu:1069: avālambata dehena śayyāṃ cintāṃ ca cetasā // AKad_5.84 //
GK19akadambu:1070: kiṃ syur gandharvakanyāyā vilāsāḥ sahajā ime /
GK19akadambu:1071: utemaṃ janam uddiśya bālāṃ nartayati smaraḥ // AKad_5.85 //
GK19akadambu:1073: tathā sambhāvanā hīyaṃ mama cetasi vartate // AKad_5.86 //
GK19akadambu:1075: sa kālapariṇāmena na jāne kiṃ phaliṣyati // AKad_5.87 //
GK19akadambu:1077: kva mānuṣyaḥ kva gandharva iti kiṃ tena saṃgatam // AKad_5.88 //
GK19akadambu:1079: kālena vyajyate sarvaṃ kathaṃ ca mama sainikāḥ // AKad_5.89 //
GK19akadambu:1081: cakāra mukulākāre cakṣuṣī ā niśātyayāt // AKad_5.90 //
GK19akadambu:1083: kādambarīmahāśvete dṛṣṭvā labdhvā cirād iva // AKad_5.91 //
GK19akadambu:1085: sa indrāyudham āruhya pratasthe pṛtanāṃ prati // AKad_5.92 //
GK19akadambu:1086: atha kenāpy upāyena labdhamārgam asau nijam /
GK19akadambu:1088: tatra dṛṣṭvā nṛpān sarvān mantriputraṃ rahasy asau /
GK19akadambu:1090: niśi tasyām atītāyām anyedyur udite ravau /
GK19akadambu:1092: kādambarī na paṭvīti tvām abhīṣṇaṃ didṛkṣate /
GK19akadambu:1093: vismṛtaṃ śayanīye ca śeṣahāram upāharat // AKad_5.96 //
GK19akadambu:1095: candrāpīḍaḥ punas tūrṇaṃ hemakūṭam athāgamat // AKad_5.97 //
GK19akadambu:1101: tata utthātum icchantī śayānaivāsta tadgirā // AKad_5.100 //
GK19akadambu:1104: tathā tatra ciraṃ sthitvā tāṃ tathā vaśavartinīm /
GK19akadambu:1105: bhaṅgībhaṇitibhir vyaktam āvedya nijam āśayam // AKad_5.102 //
GK19akadambu:1109: avalokya tadānīṃ taṃ lekhaṃ svayam avācayat // AKad_5.104 //
GK19akadambu:1111: keyūrakakare nyasya taṃ lekhaṃ kūṇitekṣaṇaḥ // AKad_5.105 //
GK19akadambu:1112: tadartham atha saṃmantrya saha mantrisutena saḥ /
GK19akadambu:1113: evam etad iti dhyāyan prasthānasthairyam agrahīt // AKad_5.106 //
GK19akadambu:1114: satyaṃ vacmi bhavatprasādarasikaṃ ceto mamaitatpadaṃ gantuṃ necchati kiṃ tu śāsanam idaṃ nollaṅghanīyaṃ guroḥ /
GK19akadambu:1115: manyuḥ samprati sahyatāṃ punar ihāgantāsmi kādambarīṃ saṃdiśyeti sabāṣpagadgadam asau keyūrakaṃ prāhiṇot // AKad_5.107 //
GK19akadambu:1116: vaiśampāyanam abhyabhāṣata bhavān saṃvāhayan vāhinīṃ paścād eṣyati yāmi satvaram ahaṃ svalpair ito vājibhiḥ /
GK19akadambu:1117: niścityeti tadā prayāṇapaṭahe datte pratasthe tato gatvā kiñcana caṇḍikāśramataṭīm adhyāsta tasmin dine // AKad_5.108 //
GK19akadambu:1119: nītvā niśāṃ satatamaskhalitaprayāṇaiḥ svalpair dinais tvaritamujjayinīmavāpa // AKad_5.109
GK19akadambu:1121: ṣaṣṭhaḥ sargaḥ atha praviśya nagarīmupāsya pitarau ciram /
GK19akadambu:1122: śukanāsaṃ ca so 'dhyāsta kumārabhavanaṃ punaḥ // AKad_6.1 //
GK19akadambu:1124: babhūva rataye nāsya kiñcitsthāsnu cariṣṇu ca // AKad_6.2 //
GK19akadambu:1125: nākarot priyam āhāraṃ nābodhi madhuraṃ rasam /
GK19akadambu:1126: na cādriyata vāsāṃsi na siṣeve vilepanam // AKad_6.3 //
GK19akadambu:1129: divā vibhāvarīṃ dhyāyan niśi vāñchan dināgamam /
GK19akadambu:1130: udīcīm eva sāsrākṣo vīkṣamāṇo 'niśaṃ diśam // AKad_6.5 //
GK19akadambu:1132: kiṃ vadet pattralekhāṃ vā sāpi kiṃ vocyate tayā // AKad_6.6 //
GK19akadambu:1134: kālaṃ kiyantam apy evaṃ candrāpīḍo 'tyavāhayat // AKad_6.7 //
GK19akadambu:1135: ākāraḥ saṃvṛtas tv īdṛg asya gūḍhātmano 'bhavat /
GK19akadambu:1136: yathā tāṃ śūnyatāṃ tasya pitarau nādhijagmatuḥ // AKad_6.8 //
GK19akadambu:1140: kādambarīm ivāmaṃsta pasparśa ca muhurmuhuḥ // AKad_6.10 //
GK19akadambu:1142: kim asmākaṃ smaraty eṣā ruṣitehāgamanena kim // AKad_6.11 //
GK19akadambu:1144: kim etaccintayā deva gurūn ārādhaya sthiram // AKad_6.12 //
GK19akadambu:1148: tīvre virahadāvāgnau kṣiptavānasi kiṃ vṛthā // AKad_6.14 //
GK19akadambu:1151: labdhasthairyāvadan māṃ ca pattralekhe kim īdṛśam /
GK19akadambu:1152: yuktam etasya yanmanye rakṣāṃsy api na kurvate // AKad_6.16 //
GK19akadambu:1153: tataḥ prabhṛti niḥśvāsair vardhamānair dinair iva /
GK19akadambu:1158: netre mādhuryamutsṛjya gate tasyāḥ kaṣāyatām // AKad_6.19 //
GK19akadambu:1162: mlānim ānīyate tasyā niḥśvāsair adharaḥ svaraiḥ // AKad_6.21 //
GK19akadambu:1163: stanau ca virahe tasyāḥ śokān na hi bahiṣkṛtau /
GK19akadambu:1166: vāḍavaś cābdhinā naiti śamam ity adbhutadvayam // AKad_6.23 //
GK19akadambu:1168: puline cakravākīva muhur luṭhati vihvalā // AKad_6.24 //
GK19akadambu:1170: śūnye bhujalate vīkṣya vilakṣā patati kṣitau // AKad_6.25 //
GK19akadambu:1171: mā gād ayam upālabdhaḥ saṃkalpād api dūrataḥ /
GK19akadambu:1172: ity upālabhate na tvāṃ bhīteva manasāpi sā // AKad_6.26 //
GK19akadambu:1174: tvadgātrakīlitā dṛṣṭis tasyāḥ samprati vartate // AKad_6.27 //

GK19akadambu:1747: tasmin kāle sakhisahacaraḥ puṇḍarīko 'pi nākāt kiñcillajjāvanatavadano vallabhāṃ svām upetaḥ candrāpīḍaḥ svām api jānann atha mūrtiṃ tārāpīḍaṃ putravad eva praṇanāma /
GK19akadambu:1748: tadvat taṃ ca praśrayaśīlaḥ śukanāsaṃ dattānando 'vandata sarvāś ca janitrīḥ // AKad_8.90
GK19akadambu:1749: māyā dhātur iyaṃ bhaved bhagavataḥ kiṃ śvetaketor idaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tapasām athendumahasām atrendrajālāyitam
GK19akadambu:1750: vaiśampāyana ity avedi yad asāv eko 'pi tadbandhubhir yac cāsau sa tu puṇḍarīka iti te tasmin bhave saṃsthitāḥ // AKad_8.91 //
GK19akadambu:1751: sa puṇḍarīko munir apy apaśyad ātmānam antaḥ śukanāsaputram /
GK19akadambu:1752: praṇamya bhūmau pitaraṃ krameṇa manoramādyā jananīr vavande // AKad_8.92
GK19akadambu:1755: tārāpīḍas tu pādānatam anavarataprasrutānandabāṣpaś candrāpīḍaṃ bhujābhyāṃ katham api sahasotthāpya kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā /
GK19akadambu:1756: śāpenātrāvatīrṇo yadi tad api bhavān uttamo lokapālaḥ prakhyāpyeti pratīpaṃ praṇatatanur asāv asya pādau vavande // AKad_8.94 //
GK19akadambu:1757: tasmai nivedya nṛpacakram anicchate 'pi yatnāt kramopanatayā saha
GK19akadambu:1759: nojjhāñcakāra cirasaṃcitam āśramaṃ sat tatprārthito 'pi mahiṣīsahitaś caturtham // AKad_8.95
GK19akadambu:1760: ājagmus tatra valgatturagakhurapuṭoddhūtadhūlīkaḍāraiś cūḍāpratyuptabhāsvanmaṇiruciruciraiḥ śobhamānāḥ śirobhiḥ /
GK19akadambu:1763: sārdhaṃ citrarathas tato madirayā haṃsaś ca gauryā saha draṣṭuṃ nṛttamayīm iva vyavasitām ājagmatur medinīm // AKad_8.97 //
GK19akadambu:1764: tābhyām etya nirasya tāpasatanucchāyāṃ duhitroḥ kṛte bhāsvatkautukamaṅgale navavadhūveṣe manohāriṇi
GK19akadambu:1765: nirvṛtte ca samantrahomasubhagārambhe vivāhotsave tatrānyonyasamāgamapramuditāḥ sarve mudaṃ lebhire // AKad_8.98 //
GK19akadambu:1766: iti vitatavilāsaḥ puṇḍarīkeṇa sākaṃ divi bhuvi ca vicitrodyānalīlāvihāraḥ /
GK19akadambu:1767: abhimataphalasampadvardhamānābhinandaḥ śriyam abhajata candrāpīḍamūrtir mṛgāṅkaḥ // AKad_8.99
